subject: Pharmacy at your service
body:
Dear customer.
CanadianPharmacy is one of very few online stores that sell generic medications only. Don't waste too much on what can cost less.
Most online drugstores sell low-quality drugs manufactured at underground factories in Latin America and Asia. These drugs prove to be really dangerous for your health. CanadianPharmacy is not like that. Don't run risks purchase 100% generic medications at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy for economical people who care about their health.
Yours faithfully,Dianne Salter
